ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    The odometer takes care of updating the values for X, Y and Theta based on the wheel motors tacho count.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Odometer(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor)
      The constructor for the odometer which sets the two motors (left and right) and resets the values fr x,y,theta and tacho counts.

      • getPosition

        public void getPosition(double[] position,
                        boolean[] update)
        Gets the current position information of the robot.
        Parameters:
        position - the current position of the robot
        update - set to true at postion 0 to get x, 1 to get y, 2 to get theta [x, y, z]
